predictions.text: The U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close at or above 106.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-09-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm any daily close >= 106.00 for the ICE U.S. Dollar Index (symbol: DXY) by 2025-09-20 using a consistent source (e.g., ICE/TradingView/MarketWatch). Close defined as New York end-of-day.
monitoring_signals: USD/JPY spot level and MoF/BoJ commentary
Fed rate cut odds (CME FedWatch) and UST 2y yield moves
Trade/tariff headlines impacting EUR, CNY, and EM FX
predictions.rationale: Risk-off and tariff rhetoric tend to support the dollar; markets price Fed cuts but global uncertainty is elevated.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-year TIPS real yield (FRED: DFII10) will close at or below 1.70% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use FRED series DFII10 daily close. Event is true if DFII10 <= 1.70% on any observation dated on/before 2025-09-30 (U.S. trading days).
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and September FOMC outcome
Breakeven inflation (FRED: T10YIE) vs nominal 10y yield (FRED: DGS10)
Risk sentiment (equities, VIX) and safe-haven flows
predictions.rationale: Heightened policy uncertainty and priced-in easing increase odds of duration bids and lower real yields.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA US Corporate Index OAS (FRED: BAMLCC0A0CM) will be at least 8 bps higher on 2025-09-30 than on 2025-08-26.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare FRED BAMLCC0A0CM daily values: 2025-09-30 minus 2025-08-26 >= 0.08 percentage points (8 bps). If 09-30 missing, use the latest available on/before 09-30.
monitoring_signals: Primary market issuance volumes and concessions
IG fund flows (Lipper/EPFR) and ETF flows (LQD)
Equity volatility (VIX) and Treasury curve moves
predictions.rationale: IG spreads often drift wider on policy uncertainty and macro jitters, even amid lower rates.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-26 close to 2025-09-20 close, Interactive Brokers (IBKR) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close, compute [IBKR return] - [SPY return] from 2025-08-26 close to 2025-09-20 close. Prediction is true if the difference >= +4.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: S&P index inclusion effective date and index fund rebalancing flows
Short interest and borrow cost for IBKR
Brokerage peers’ performance (SCHW, HOOD) and retail activity
predictions.rationale: Incoming index demand and attention tailwinds typically lift new S&P 500 entrants into effective date.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-26 close to 2025-09-30 close, Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close, compute [WBA return] - [SPY return] from 2025-08-26 close to 2025-09-30 close. Prediction is true if the difference <= -4.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Index deletion timing and passive outflows
Guidance revisions and pharmacy reimbursement headlines
Credit metrics and dividend policy updates
predictions.rationale: S&P removal can pressure shares via passive selling, with fundamentals still challenged.

predictions.text: The U.S. national average regular gasoline price (AAA) on 2025-09-20 will be at least $0.07/gal higher than on 2025-08-26.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use AAA Gas Prices daily national average for regular unleaded (https://gasprices.aaa.com). Compare the posted value for 2025-09-20 minus 2025-08-26; event is true if >= $0.07.
monitoring_signals: Brent/WTI front-month futures and crack spreads
EIA gasoline inventories and refinery utilization
Storm/hurricane disruptions and regional pipeline outages
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand into Labor Day and tightness risks can lift retail prices modestly.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-15, at least two of DHL Express, UPS, or FedEx will publish customer notices announcing temporary surcharges, suspensions, or material service changes for EU-to-U.S. small parcel shipments citing U.S. de minimis changes.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm two or more official notices (newsroom, service alerts, tariff guides) from DHL Express, UPS, or FedEx dated on/before 2025-09-15 explicitly referencing U.S. de minimis policy changes as the reason for surcharges/suspensions/service changes.
monitoring_signals: Carrier service alert pages and tariff updates
CBP announcements on de minimis enforcement timelines
Trade association guidance (Express Association of America)
predictions.rationale: Early European shipment pauses suggest broader express network adjustments ahead of policy change.

predictions.text: University of Michigan September 2025 preliminary Consumer Sentiment Index will be at least 3.0 points lower than the August 2025 final reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the September 2025 preliminary Consumer Sentiment Index (University of Michigan release) to the August 2025 final value. Event is true if Sep prelim <= Aug final − 3.0.
monitoring_signals: Equity drawdowns and gasoline prices ahead of survey window
News sentiment and political uncertainty metrics
Weekly jobless claims and layoff announcements
predictions.rationale: Heightened policy and geopolitical uncertainty may depress consumer sentiment near-term.
